description: This file defines a Retrofit interface ApiService for network API interactions related to user authentication and note management.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Sends login credentials to the server and retrieves a login response.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Sends registration data to the server and retrieves a registration response.

methods.name: getNotes
methods.description: Retrieves a list of notes for an authorized user.

methods.name: getNote
methods.description: Retrieves a specific note by ID for an authorized user.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Creates a new note for an authorized user.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by ID.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID for an authorized user.
